channel.title: Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

image.title: Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – August 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Demos - Using Forms and Power Automate to Upgrade your Customer Onboarding Experience, Building a Time Sheeting Power Apps canvas app using Dataverse, and Connecting Power Pages to your Dataverse data.

Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Demos - Using Forms and Power Automate to Upgrade your Customer Onboarding Experience, Building a Time Sheeting Power Apps canvas app using Dataverse, and Connecting Power Pages to your Dataverse data.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 11th of August, 2022
item.description: Demos on Building React Taxonomy File Explorer experience with SPFx and Introduction to new Viva Connections Toolkit VS Code extension to streamline your development. Project releases for SPFx, PnPjs and CLI for Microsoft 365. Delivered 3 web part + 1 ACE sample.

Demos on Building React Taxonomy File Explorer experience with SPFx and Introduction to new Viva Connections Toolkit VS Code extension to streamline your development. Project releases for SPFx, PnPjs and CLI for Microsoft 365. Delivered 3 web part + 1 ACE sample.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – August 2022
item.description: Overview of the React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer and on the usage of the React Native adaptive card SDK in a Microsoft Viva Connections mobile app and in a LUIS chatbot app delivered by the maintainers at BigThinkCode.

Overview of the React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer and on the usage of the React Native adaptive card SDK in a Microsoft Viva Connections mobile app and in a LUIS chatbot app delivered by the maintainers at BigThinkCode.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Upload files to SharePoint with JavaScript using Microsoft Graph and Microsoft Authentication Library
item.description: Phu, thats a long title – but I wanted to make it really clear what this blog post is about.
Phu, thats a long title – but I wanted to make it really clear what this blog post is about.
item.dc:creator: Eli Schei

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 28th of July, 2022
item.description: Demos on Using OneDrive File Picker v8 control in your solution & How to create custom list forms with SPFx. Released CLI for Microsoft 365 – v5.5.0 (GA) and delivered 2 web part samples – Room Chat (new) and Page Navigator (updated).

Demos on Using OneDrive File Picker v8 control in your solution & How to create custom list forms with SPFx. Released CLI for Microsoft 365 – v5.5.0 (GA) and delivered 2 web part samples – Room Chat (new) and Page Navigator (updated).
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – July 2022
item.description: Integrate a React single-page app with the Microsoft identity platform. Enable SSO and get an access token for Microsoft Graph API. Subscribe to MSAL events, protect routes using MSAL Angular Guard, and acquire tokens with MSAL React hooks.

Integrate a React single-page app with the Microsoft identity platform. Enable SSO and get an access token for Microsoft Graph API. Subscribe to MSAL events, protect routes using MSAL Angular Guard, and acquire tokens with MSAL React hooks.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – July 13, 2022
item.description: Word API updates, Outlook add-ins updates (REST decommission, shared folders support, item multi-select), and SSO samples update. This month’s Community Spotlight recognizes Maarten van Stam. Covered community panels plus Q&A in chat and at end of call.

Word API updates, Outlook add-ins updates (REST decommission, shared folders support, item multi-select), and SSO samples update. This month’s Community Spotlight recognizes Maarten van Stam. Covered community panels plus Q&A in chat and at end of call.
item.dc:creator: Preethika Kiruveedula

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – July 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Three demos delivered – Building a SharePoint Document Library Approvals System, Microsoft Teams Approvals in Dynamics 365 using Power Automate, and How to connect Microsoft Dataverse to Microsoft Teams.

Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Three demos delivered – Building a SharePoint Document Library Approvals System, Microsoft Teams Approvals in Dynamics 365 using Power Automate, and How to connect Microsoft Dataverse to Microsoft Teams.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – July 2022
item.description: Action.ToggleVisibility Deprecation (a non-breaking change for a control that needs to support accessibility requirements for all users), Adaptive Cards Handle Responses Connector now GA, React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer next month and 10-minute Q&A.

Action.ToggleVisibility Deprecation (a non-breaking change for a control that needs to support accessibility requirements for all users), Adaptive Cards Handle Responses Connector now GA, React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer next month and 10-minute Q&A.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 14th of July, 2022
item.description: Demos on Upgrading SPFx solutions to the latest version using the CLI for Microsoft 365 and Adaptive Card Extensions - Dynamic Announcements. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI for Microsoft 365, and React Controls. Three web part samples delivered.

Demos on Upgrading SPFx solutions to the latest version using the CLI for Microsoft 365 and Adaptive Card Extensions - Dynamic Announcements. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI for Microsoft 365, and React Controls. Three web part samples delivered.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – June 2022
item.description: Deep dive into how your app can build on Teams SSO and the Microsoft identity platform. We will also discuss how you can connect the Microsoft Identity of a user to your own user store.
Deep dive into how your app can build on Teams SSO and the Microsoft identity platform. We will also discuss how you can connect the Microsoft Identity of a user to your own user store.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 30th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building custom accordion Tabs experience with rich text experiences, Using Microsoft Graph Profile API in SPFx for awards web part experience, and Adaptive Cards Extensions strategy pattern for multi-action QuickView. Released Reusable SPFx React Controls v3.8.1 and 2 samples.

Demos: Building custom accordion Tabs experience with rich text experiences, Using Microsoft Graph Profile API in SPFx for awards web part experience, and Adaptive Cards Extensions strategy pattern for multi-action QuickView. Released Reusable SPFx React Controls v3.8.1 and 2 samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: What is a Microsoft 365 Developer, and how to get started
item.description: Since you have found this corner of the internet, chances are that you already have some idea of what a Microsoft 355 Developer does.
Since you have found this corner of the internet, chances are that you already have some idea of what a Microsoft 355 Developer does.

item.title: A collection of resources for Microsoft 365 developers
item.description: Being a Microsoft 365 developer can mean a lot of things.
Being a Microsoft 365 developer can mean a lot of things.
item.dc:creator: Eli Schei

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 16th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building a safer custom Content Editor Web Part with SPFx, Getting started on using GitHub Codespaces with your SharePoint Framework solutions, MyShifts – SharePoint Framework Viva Connections - Adaptive Card Extension. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI, Search + 4 samples.

Demos: Building a safer custom Content Editor Web Part with SPFx, Getting started on using GitHub Codespaces with your SharePoint Framework solutions, MyShifts – SharePoint Framework Viva Connections - Adaptive Card Extension. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI, Search + 4 samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – June 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news and events. Welcome Hugo Bernier - Community Program Manager for Power Pages. Two brilliant demos delivered – Taking your Power Apps mobile navigation UI to the next level! And Power to the Pages – Introduction to Power Pages!

Latest Power Platform related news and events. Welcome Hugo Bernier - Community Program Manager for Power Pages. Two brilliant demos delivered – Taking your Power Apps mobile navigation UI to the next level! And Power to the Pages – Introduction to Power Pages!
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) June 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) June 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – June 8, 2022
item.description: Microsoft roadmap for One Outlook, Outlook Smart Alerts (Demo), Using Blazor in an Excel add-in. Q&A in chat and at end of call.
Microsoft roadmap for One Outlook, Outlook Smart Alerts (Demo), Using Blazor in an Excel add-in. Q&A in chat and at end of call.
item.dc:creator: Sam Ramon

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – June 2022
item.description: New Teams Toolkit v4.0 features enable developers and non-developers to create Teams apps with minimal work. New features called out are used in a scenario-based Teams timer trigger app that delivers Adaptive Card notifications in Teams. 20 minute Q&A.

New Teams Toolkit v4.0 features enable developers and non-developers to create Teams apps with minimal work. New features called out are used in a scenario-based Teams timer trigger app that delivers Adaptive Card notifications in Teams. 20 minute Q&A.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 2nd of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building FAQs web part with Property Field Collection Data, Solve Teams and SharePoint Theme problems with the ‘Enhanced Theme Provider’ control, and Building custom list form components with SPFx v1.15. Released SPFx v1.15 (RC), 6 web part, 4 ACE samples.

Demos: Building FAQs web part with Property Field Collection Data, Solve Teams and SharePoint Theme problems with the ‘Enhanced Theme Provider’ control, and Building custom list form components with SPFx v1.15. Released SPFx v1.15 (RC), 6 web part, 4 ACE samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: How to use the Power Platform developer plan with the Microsoft 365 Developer program
item.description: What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.

What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Irabor

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – May 2022
item.description: Microsoft Graph’s advanced capabilities for querying directory objects – learn how to unlock the full potential of our Directory Object APIs using the Advanced Query Capabilities, allowing developers to Count, Filter, Search and Sort Directory Objects on more properties with more OData operators.

Microsoft Graph’s advanced capabilities for querying directory objects – learn how to unlock the full potential of our Directory Object APIs using the Advanced Query Capabilities, allowing developers to Count, Filter, Search and Sort Directory Objects on more properties with more OData operators.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – May 2022
item.description: Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.

Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 19th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.

Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – May 2022
item.description: Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.

Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca
